title: cant connect to a game due to the last update
body: after champ select it says cant connect to server and i was put on a lever buster because of it i cant get into a game

replies.body: can i get relived of my leaver buster? due to it wast intentional

The same exact thing happened to me. 20 minute low priority q waits now. This is crazy. My internet is perfectly fine its not my connection it's something with the client. Please lift this leaverbuster..
and i did the ip flush and tested it on custom match and it worked

No worries, I can help you out with this!  The failure to connect after champion select is usually due to your network having problems connecting to the game server.  The best fix for this can be found in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Make sure to go over each step to tune up your connection.  Let me know if you have any questions!
